sense.name: devote or adapt exclusively to an skill, study, or work
sense.commentary: Syntax is: NP1 SPECIALIZE IN NP2
sense.examples: This plumber specialized in jacuzzis. She's specializing in pediatrics. She's hired a lawyer who specializes in divorce cases. Our study specilizes in honey bees. The B-cell specializes in detecting bacteria. I love restaurants that specialize in seafood. The shop specializes in mountain-climbing gear.

sense.name: gear or develop something to a particular purpose
sense.examples: She has finally specialized her field of research. It is the transcription of mRNAs that specializes a cell.

sense.name: specify, make particular note of, give details
sense.examples: I can specialize the method for you. Who should I specialize this check to?
